name: National Railway Company CFR S.A.
goal:
Mission
The National Railway Company "CFR" SA offers to all the railway undertakings, with competitive costs, the access to a functional, efficient and environmental friendly infrastructure, on which the passengers and goods move safely, in any season, day and night, regardless the weather conditions, according to the established timetables.

Open access
CFR aligns the European policy of openness and competitiveness with the requirements of a national and regional sustainable and balanced development serving the community. CFR provides the railway undertakings with an open access to the rail network and to all ancillary facilities, on a contractual basis, using transparent and non-discriminatory charges, in conditions of safety and performance.

Competitive offer
CFR has included in its strategic priorities the optimization of the traffic capacity, the operation of the full potential of the network and the implementation of innovative solutions for the traffic management and the relationship with the customers.

A modern network
The CFR efforts are focused on upgrading the existing network, with maximum priority given to interoperable railway infrastructure included in the European corridors, in order to ensure their performances and efficient operation.

A European market
The CFR policy is aligned to the international dimension generated by Romania's EU membership status and meets its objectives of market openness and interoperability in order to increase the potential and the importance of the railway transport in Europe. The railway infrastructure in Romania is part of two pan-European corridors - IV and IX, as well as of the Rail Freight Corridor 7.

Performance Contract with the State
CFR acts based upon agreed performance indicators included in the Performance Contract, with clear objectives for efficiency and effectiveness in order to optimally capitalize the budgetary resources allocated for the maintenance of the railway infrastructure, controlling the costs and permanently improving the processes.

Sustainable development
The sustainable development is included in the strategic focus of CFR and has as main objective the long-term development of the overall performance in connection with the environmental protection. CFR supports the green economy and the ongoing reduction of the carbon emissions and also the waste control.

CFR ensures the development and modernization of the railway infrastructure in Romania in line with the European standards for performance and interoperability.
